message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you, and this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit too high for my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is there any wiggle room in your price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $14,000 is my initial asking price, I'm open to negotiation. However, $9,000 is significantly below its value.  Could you meet me halfway at $11,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $11,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
